email_text:
Subject: Your Monthly Verizon Bill Notification

Dear [Customer's Name],

We hope this message finds you well. This is a friendly reminder that your monthly Verizon bill is now available for review and payment. Below is a summary of your charges for the current billing period:

- Account Number: XXXXXXXX
- Billing Period: [Month/Year]
- Total Amount Due: $XX.XX

For a detailed breakdown of your charges, please download your bill in PDF format by clicking on the following link: [PDF Download Link]

We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter. If you have any questions or concerns regarding your bill, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team at [Customer Service Number].

Thank you for choosing Verizon as your service provider.

Sincerely,
Verizon Customer Service Team
